page1: **<a:righter_arrow:518744759506960406> Click on the arrows to change the page! <a:lefter_arrow:518744793489342464>**
page2:
**:desktop: General Commands**
\`help/commands\` - Show a list of commands & guides to your DM.
\`ping\` - Show the current bot ping/ms.
\`verify/verification\` - Verify your discord account.
\`botinfo\` - Shows the information of the bot.
\`serverinfo\` - Show the information of the guild.
\`userinfo <user>\` - Show the information of the user.
\`guilds/servers\` - Show a list of <@482795587045949440> guilds.
\`leaderboard/leaderstats\` - Show a list of <@482795587045949440> guilds, from the most members to least.
\`weather <city/state/province/prefecture>\` - Show the current weather statistics.
\`calc/calculate/calculator <equation>\` - Solve the given equation.
page3:
**:tools: Moderation Commands**
\`report <user> <reason>\` - Report a user to the guild administrator.
\`clear <amount>\` - Clear the given amount of messages.
\`kick <user> <reason>\` - Kick a user with the given reason.
\`ban <user> <reason>\` - Ban a user with the given reason.
\`setlog <channel>\` - Set the mod-logs channel.
\`addrole <user> <role>\` - Add a role to the user.
\`removerole <user> <role>\` - Remove a role to the user.
\`say <text>\` - Force <@482795587045949440> to chat with your given text.
\`poll <text>\` - Create a vote poll with <:green_tick:566945998761361408> and <:red_tick:566946004948090880> as a reaction to vote.
\`prefix <bot prefix>\` - Change the bot prefix with your own choice.
page4:
**<:dogecoin:419079613499703296> Economy Commands**
\`bal/balance/cash/coin/coins/money <user>\` - Display the user balance.
\`donate/pay <user> <amount>\` - Donate the given amount of money to the user.
\`buy/shop\` - Display a shop.
\`battle <user> <amount>\` - Classic betting with 50% chance of winning/losing.
page5:
**:game_die: Fun Commands**
\`dog/doggo\` - A fun command that show a random dog photo/gif.
\`cat\` - A fun command that show a random cat photo/gif.
\`doge/shibe/shiba\` - A fun command that show a random shibe photo/gif.
\`8ball <question>\` - A fun command that answer your question
\`minecraft <player>\` - Show the player statistics.
\`roblox <player>\` - Show the player statistics.
